messages.message: I noticed that when a vertical picture is long, and occupies the whole page, and AI Hub tries to make it horizontal to read the text, some clipping may occur at the sides, perhaps because the horizontal dimension of the page is shorter that its length. Has this been tested? In this example here, there is some clipping and the signature is not detected. Original document attached (page 13). <#C05BJCNKZAM|>
